name: Overduty VR: Battle Royale - Founders Pack
name_original: Overduty VR: Battle Royale - Founders Pack
description:
Overduty VR: Battle Royale brings you into the thrill of a real battle royale experience. You must rely on strategically maneuvering the 4km by 4km map & scouring for weapons, attachments, and vehicles to claim the victory as the last fighter standing.

FEATURES

  • Fast-paced movement with Jetpack Thrusters
  • Unlock skins by leveling up through 80+ levels
  • Cars and Hoverbikes with VR driving mechanics
  • More than 8 guns with various attachments
  • 50+ player multiplayer matches with VoIP

 

                     

FOUNDERS PACK

This founders pack comes with access to closed beta testing, currently in a multiplayer free roam demo. It also includes exclusive founders skins for players and weapons in game. Secure a spot as one of the first to join the fight, and show off your new skins!

To join the conversation, join us on Discord, Founder's receive exclusive rank!
